text: To design the button, Reese Witherspoon tapped designer Arianne Phillips, who is now calling on the fashion industry to donate money to the Time's Up fund, too. The hottest accessory on the Golden Globes red carpet on Sunday will be the Time ’ s Up pin, expected to be worn by leading ladies and men alike to draw attention to the sexual harassment prevention initiative launched Monday by Shonda Rhimes, Reese Witherspoon, Emma Stone and other prominent Hollywood women. Witherspoon asked costume designer and stylist Arianne Phillips ( Kingsman, Nocturnal Animals, W. E. ) to design the pin during a private meeting last month at CAA where the Time ’ s Up initiative was hatched by studio heads, producers, agents and actresses who split into discussion groups to tackle different aspects
